entities.name: Bearing_Design

entities.name: material
entities.description: Indicates a type of material like sheet steel

entities.name: Technical_Specification
entities.description: Technical aspects of bearing components, including material types, dimensions, and design modifications like tapered bores.

relations.name: are_available_with

relations.name: are_supplied_with

relations.name: are_fitted_with
relations.description: Indicates that a specific bearing comes with a specific feature.

relations.name: is_made_of
relations.description: Indicates the material that a specific bearing is made of.

relations.name: fitted_in

relations.name: fixed_by
relations.description: Indicates that a specific bearing is positioned in a specific way.

relations.name: filled_with
relations.description: Indicates that a specific bearing is filled with a specific grease
